DOC.brief_title: Study Nucel One Two Level Lumbar Interbody Fusion
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred non-randomized subject participate study ten clinical site United States . Participants 18 75 year age . All subject establish lumbar spine disease one two level lumbar spine require lumbar interbody fusion procedure per opinion treat surgeon . The disease include study spondylosis , degenerative disc disease spondylolisthesis . All subject meet inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion elect participate sign inform consent include study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be 18 75 year age 2 . Have clinical and/or radiological evidence stenosis , spondylolisthesis , spondylosis degenerative disc disease , either one two level lumbar spine . 3 . In opinion treating surgeon , must already qualify candidate interbody lumbar fusion surgery supplemental fixation . 4 . Be likely return regular followup end study period . 5 . Be willing able provide Informed Consent study participation . 1 . Previous lumbar spine fusion surgery operative level . 2 . Back pain due acute trauma . 3 . Clinical , laboratory and/or radiological evidence back pain secondary acute chronic infection , malignancy , space occupy lesion metabolic bone demineralization disease ( e.g . osteomalacia , gout , Paget 's disease etc . ) 4 . No chronic steroid chronic prescription NSAID use within three ( 3 ) month prior surgery . 5 . Any active malignancy , infectious process , document chronic autoimmune disease . 6 . Any concurrent medical disease treatment might impair normal heal process . 7 . Recent history ( within past 6 month ) chemical alcohol dependence . 8 . Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 ) . 9 . Currently prisoner . 10 . Currently experience major mental illness ( psychosis , schizophrenia , major affective disorder ) may indicate symptom psychological rather physical origin . 11 . Pregnancy time enrollment plan pregnancy , would interfere followup imaging .
